short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT with privacy protection - Purple Shield hides sensitive data automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our extension ensures your sensitive information remains protected while using ChatGPT. It seamlessly anonymizes sensitive text in your prompts and de-anonymizes the responses, making the process transparent and worry-free. With robust policy-based protection, it covers all types of sensitive information, ensuring compliance with HIPAA, GDPR, and PCI standards. You can easily monitor what data is sent to ChatGPT and disable the extension when not needed. Importantly, no chat data is retained by the service, safeguarding your privacy.


Main Features:
*Anonymizes Sensitive Text: Automatically anonymizes sensitive information in your prompts.
*De-anonymizes Responses: De-anonymizes ChatGPT responses to maintain a seamless user experience.
*Policy-Based Protection: Protects various types of sensitive information based on set policies.
*Data Visibility: Allows you to see what information is being sent to ChatGPT.
*Easy Control: Option to turn the extension off when not needed.
*Compliance Support: Helps maintain HIPAA, GDPR, and PCI compliance.


You'll love the peace of mind and ease of use this extension brings to your ChatGPT interactions, keeping your sensitive information secure and compliant.
